column4: guys please could you help me with my usb? it cannot detect anything, my /proc/bus/usb is empty so I added none /proc/bus/usb usbdevfs defaults 0 0 to the fstab but no success
try tail -f /var/log/messages and plug in your usb, see what your system is really doing
I did the tail -f /var/log/messages but no changes
